TITLE: Pumuawiti Free Restuarant Card
LINE1: E ahau he mate i huaina Celiac mate me whai ki te whai i te pumuawiti tino kai free.
LINE2: reira ai ahau hei tino mate ki te kai ahau flours kai kei roto purapura o witi, rai, parei, me te ōti ranei.
LINE3: E roto i tenei kai paraoa purapura o witi, rai, parei ōti ranei ranei? Ki te ko koe i pahuhu katoa e pā ana ki te mea kei roto te kai, tēnā korero ki ahau.
LINE4: Ka taea e kai ahau raihi kai kei roto, te kānga, te rīwai, momo katoa o huawhenua, me te hua, hua, te tīhi, te waiu, kai me te ika - rite te roa rite kahore ratou e tunua ki te paraoa witi, pokeranu, rürü ranei ranu.
